snippet: Traders who had hoped for a sign that the Federal Reserve would take new steps to stimulate the economy were disappointed.
abstract: Stock market bounces back from an afternoon slump after the Federal Reserve releases disappointing minutes from its June meeting.
lead_paragraph: Traders who had hoped for a sign that the Federal Reserve would take new steps to stimulate the economy were disappointed.

headline.seo: Reacting to Fed Minutes, Indexes Dip but Recover
headline.main: Reacting to Fed Minutes, Indexes Dip but Recover
headline.print_headline: Reacting to Fed Minutes, Indexes Dip but Recover
